text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: For inheritance, their “compatibility” is determined by the relationship between the trained horsegirl and her successors.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: If they have good compatibility, you're a little more likely to have good things happen to them!
color_text_info_list: you're a little more likely to have

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: You may want to keep this in mind as a reference for future combinations! ♪
